LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.0.label: お腹が空いた
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.0.description: 本当にお腹が空いてきた。
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.1.label: ravenously hungry
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.1.description: お腹が空いて、他の事ができない。
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.2.label: malnourished
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.2.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus. My body is starting to waste away.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.3.label: badly malnourished
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.3.description: 身体が衰弱していくのがわかる。胃がキリキリと病んでいる。
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.4.label: 飢餓
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.4.description: 私はなんとか、やっとの思いで食べ物以外の事を考えることができる。皮膚は骨に張り付いている。このままだと死ぬのかな？
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.5.label: advanced starvation
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.5.description: 私はなんとか、やっとの思いで食べ物以外の事を考えることができる。皮膚は骨に張り付いている。もう死ぬのかな？
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.6.label: 飢餓(末期)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.6.description: 食べ物...たべも...食べる... なんでも... ょうだい...
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.0.label: drowsy
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.0.description: I haven't slept in a while. It's hard to keep focus.
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.1.label: 疲れた
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.1.description: とても疲れた。今すぐ横になって、数分でも休みたい...
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.2.label: 疲れ果てた
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.2.description: 私は精根尽き果てた、かろうじて立っている。まぶたが重い、眠りたい……
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.0.label: recreation-starved
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.0.description: It's been so long since I did anything for fun on my own time.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.1.label: recreation-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.1.description: We need more variation in recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them. This place is really dull.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.2.label: recreation unfulfilled
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.2.description: We need more variation in the recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.3.label: recreation satisfied
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.3.description: I've been having a great time doing various things I like to do.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.4.label: recreation fully satisfied
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.4.description: とても面白くて、とても気に入った!
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.0.label: 心地よくない
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.0.description: 心地よくない、私達が、この辺りで座るには、何か柔らかい物が必要だ。
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.1.label: 心地よい
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.1.description: 最近、快適に過ごしている。
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.2.label: quite comfortable
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.2.description: 最近、とても快適に過ごしている。
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.3.label: 非常に心地よい
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.3.description: 最近、非常に快適に過ごしている。この場所は贅沢な場所です。
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.4.label: 素晴らしく心地よい
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.4.description: 天上の雲の上で休息しているようだ。
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.0.label: 極めて嫌な環境
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.0.description: This place is unbearably grotesque. I can't look at this any more.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.1.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.1.description: This place is really ugly. I wish I didn't have to look at this any more.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.2.label: unsightly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.2.description: This place is kind of unsightly. I wish I didn't have to look at all this.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.3.label: pretty environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.4.label: beautiful environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.4.description: 私は本当にここが好きです。とても綺麗。
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.5.label: gorgeous environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.5.description: この場所は美しい。気分も高揚し、幸せな人生をおくらせてくれます。
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.0.label: confined interior
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.0.description: This space is so tiny. I feel like a rat in a cage.
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.1.label: 狭い室内
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.1.description: This room is too small. I wish I had more space to move around and breathe.
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.2.label: 広々室内
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.2.description: This room is so expansive, I feel free.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.0.label: entombed underground
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.0.description: I've been underground too long. I feel like the weight of this mountain is crushing me. I need to see the sky and feel the wind.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.1.label: trapped underground
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.1.description: How long have I been underground? I need to get out in the fresh air and spend some time under the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.2.label: cabin fever
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.2.description: I've spent so long indoors I feel like the roof is pressing in. I need to get out and see the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.3.label: trapped indoors
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.3.description: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.4.label: stuck indoors
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.4.description: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.
